sentences.en: A linear transformation on Milbert space is called compact ( also completely continuous ).
sentences.cn: 希尔伯特空间上的线性变换叫做紧的 ( 也叫全连续的 ).

sentences.en: But the breadth of the economic transformation can't be measured by numbers alone.
sentences.cn: 但不能只靠数字来衡量经济变化的程度.

sentences.en: Europe, with Germany literally and figuratively at its centre, is still at the start of a remarkable transformation.
sentences.cn: 以德国作为地理以及比喻意义上的中心的欧洲仍处于巨大变革的初期。

sentences.en: From then on his attitude to life underwent a transformation.
sentences.cn: “这人间毕竟还有温暖,”他感激地想着,从此他改变了生活态度.

sentences.en: Going to college brought about a dramatic transformation in her outlook.
sentences.cn: 上大学使她的观念发生了巨大的变化.

sentences.en: In recent years, the movie industry has undergone a dramatic transformation .
sentences.cn: 近些年，电影业经历了巨大的变革。

sentences.en: In the last five years he's undergone a personal transformation.
sentences.cn: 过去5年里他整个人发生了全新的转变。

sentences.en: The continuous transformation connects smoothly to the unit operator.
sentences.cn: 连续变换光滑地衔接到单位算符.

sentences.en: The culmination of the work on singularities is two famous transformation theorems.
sentences.cn: 奇点研究的顶峰是两个著名的变换定理.

sentences.en: The physical origin of the gauge transformation is a mystery.
sentences.cn: 这个规范变换的物理起因还是个谜.

sentences.en: The residual nucleus will, in general, undergo a radioactive transformation.
sentences.cn: 剩余核一般说来将发生一次放射性衰变.

sentences.en: The reversal of any entropychanging transformation would be neither reasonable nor possible.
sentences.cn: 熵的任何反向变化都是不合理的也是不可能的.

sentences.en: The way in which we work has undergone a complete transformation in the past decade.
sentences.cn: 在过去的十年里，我们的工作方式经历了彻底的变革。

sentences.en: This new transformation is at least as consequential as that one was.
sentences.cn: 这一新的转变至少和那次一样重要。

sentences.en: To derive the transformation equations , we return to Fig. 14 - 1.
sentences.cn: 为了求出这个变换式, 我们回顾图14 - 1.

sentences.en: We carry out a transformation to spherical polar coordinates.

words.tran_cn: 可变化的；可变形的；可转化的
[电] 变压器；促使变化的人

phrases.tran_cn: 保角变换，保角映射；保形变换，共形变换
马氏体转变；马顿斯体式变化；麻田散体式变化
转换过程，转换程序；变革过程
转变温度；变态温度；相变点

trans.tran_cn: 变化，<核>转换，<语>转换，<电>变换
trans.tran_en: a complete change in someone or something
